channel.title: Fix This for me :)
channel.description:
Compiler: @echo off title Ultimate PK Compiler color B "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
Error: Cannot find the path specified.
ps; using pimpscape.
I need to find out, how to edit THAT code, to make it work with the runserver.
Runserver @echo off title UltimatePK - Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

item.title: Fix This for me :)
item.dc:creator: @Nics Nics
item.description:
@Nics wrote:

Compiler:
@echo off
title Ultimate PK Compiler
color B
“C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

Error: Cannot find the path specified.

ps; using pimpscape.

I need to find out, how to edit THAT code, to make it work with the runserver.

Runserver
@echo off
title UltimatePK - Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
